unnormalised: Hey film buffs! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival news. Seems like every other week there's another celebration of cinema popping up, from indie darlings to Bollywood blockbusters.
normalised: Hey film buffs! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival news. Seems like every other week there's another celebration of cinema popping up, from indie darlings to Bollywood blockbusters.

unnormalised: Just last month, the Jaipur International Film Festival wrapped up, showcasing some amazing Rajasthani talent. Word on the street is that the competition was fierce!
normalised: Just last month, the Jaipur International Film Festival wrapped up, showcasing some amazing Rajasthani talent. Word on the street is that the competition was fierce!

unnormalised: And get this, the Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up for its next edition. We're expecting a star-studded affair with some of the biggest names in Bengali cinema in attendance.
normalised: And get this, the Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up for its next edition. We're expecting a star-studded affair with some of the biggest names in Bengali cinema in attendance.

unnormalised: Speaking of big names, whispers are circulating about a potential special screening featuring a classic Bollywood romance at a smaller, more intimate festival down south – maybe near Chennai? Think stunning visuals and heartwarming stories, perfect with a plate of spicy biryani after a long day of screenings.
normalised: Speaking of big names, whispers are circulating about a potential special screening featuring a classic Bollywood romance at a smaller, more intimate festival down south – maybe near Chennai? Think stunning visuals and heartwarming stories, perfect with a plate of spicy biryani after a long day of screenings.

unnormalised: It's amazing how these festivals bring together so many creative minds! They're not just about the films, though; it's the discussions, the connections, and of course, the after-parties! Keep an eye out for announcements – you might just discover your next favorite filmmaker or film!
normalised: It's amazing how these festivals bring together so many creative minds! They're not just about the films, though; it's the discussions, the connections, and of course, the after-parties! Keep an eye out for announcements – you might just discover your next favorite filmmaker or film!
